FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Common questions about electric fireplaces.
FAQ.q1: How does an electric fireplace work?
FAQ.a1: Electric fireplaces are devices that convert electrical energy into heat, warming your room while providing visual flame effects. Inside, there is a heating mechanism that works to increase the room's temperature. LED lights on the front simulate flame effects, providing an aesthetic appearance.
FAQ.q2: What are the advantages of an electric fireplace?
FAQ.a2: Easy Installation: No chimney or gas connection required. Energy Efficiency: Converts energy directly into heat. Eco-Friendly: No carbon emissions. Heat Control: Thermostats allow you to adjust the temperature. Aesthetic Appeal: Fits any interior decoration with visual flame effects.
FAQ.q3: Can I use an electric fireplace in any room?
FAQ.a3: Yes, electric fireplaces can be used in any room with an electrical outlet. Since they don't require a chimney, they offer flexible placement options indoors.
FAQ.q4: Is it safe to use an electric fireplace?
FAQ.a4: Electric fireplaces are manufactured to high safety standards. Heaters often have automatic shut-off features to prevent overheating. Additionally, modern electric fireplaces are designed to be safe for children and pets.
FAQ.q5: How do I maintain an electric fireplace?
FAQ.a5: Electric fireplaces are low-maintenance devices. The LED lights and heaters are generally long-lasting. Periodic dusting and cleaning are sufficient. You can also refer to your product manual for more maintenance information.
FAQ.q6: How much electricity does an electric fireplace consume?
FAQ.a6: Energy consumption depends on the model and usage duration. On average, electric fireplaces consume between 1-2 kWh per hour. This provides comfortable heating with low energy costs.
FAQ.q7: Is there a real flame in an electric fireplace?
FAQ.a7: No, electric fireplaces do not use real flames. However, modern models use LED lights and special effects to simulate the look of real fire, creating a warm atmosphere visually. These effects provide an aesthetic look and create a pleasant ambiance.
FAQ.q8: How do I install an electric fireplace?
FAQ.a8: Installation is quite simple. Usually, only an electrical connection is required. You can easily install it at home by following the installation guide provided with the product. If you need professional help, you can get support from our authorized services.
FAQ.q9: Can I use an electric fireplace in the summer?
FAQ.a9: Yes, electric fireplaces can be used not only in winter but also in summer. You can turn on the flame effect without the heat to provide just a visual atmosphere. This adds a warm touch to your room even in summer.

ReturnPolicy.title: Return and Exchange Policy
ReturnPolicy.subtitle: Customer satisfaction is our priority.
ReturnPolicy.intro: As Bursa Somine, we prioritize our customers' satisfaction and do our best to ensure a seamless shopping experience. If the product you purchased does not meet your expectations, you can easily process a return or exchange. You can perform your return or exchange process by meeting the conditions below.
ReturnPolicy.timeList1: You can return your products within 14 days from the delivery date.
ReturnPolicy.timeList2: A return or exchange can be processed as long as your product is unused and in its original packaging.
ReturnPolicy.timeList3: For electric fireplaces and heater products, only defective products can be returned. If there is an issue related to the product's technical specifications and functionality, you can easily perform the necessary procedures under warranty.
ReturnPolicy.conditionsList1: For returns and exchanges, the product must be in its original box and packaging.
ReturnPolicy.conditionsList2: There should be no damage, signs of use, or missing parts on the product.
ReturnPolicy.conditionsList3: When returning the product, you will need to send it along with the invoice and return request form.
ReturnPolicy.processRequestText: When you want to return your product, you can contact us at bursasomine@hotmail.com. Submit your return request, and we will be happy to assist you.
ReturnPolicy.processExchangeText: If you wish to exchange your product for another model, after contacting our customer service in the same way, we can recommend suitable alternative products based on stock availability.
ReturnPolicy.processShippingText: For return and exchange transactions, you must send the product to the specified address. The shipping fee will be covered by the customer. Once your product reaches our return address, your transaction will be completed as soon as possible.
ReturnPolicy.considerationsTitle: Points to Consider in Return and Exchange Process
ReturnPolicy.considerationsReturnText: When your product return is accepted, your payment will be refunded to your original payment method based on your preference. For payments made by credit card, the fee will be refunded to your card.
ReturnPolicy.considerationsExchangeText: For product exchanges, another product of the same value or affordable price may be recommended based on stock availability. If the product value is different, a price difference may be requested.
ReturnPolicy.exceptionsTitle: Situations Where Return and Exchange Cannot Be Made
ReturnPolicy.exceptionsList1: If the product is used and damaged.
ReturnPolicy.exceptionsList2: If the product's original packaging is opened and the product looks like second-hand.
ReturnPolicy.exceptionsList3: For electric products, returns are accepted only in defective cases.
ReturnPolicy.warrantyText1: Our electric fireplaces are covered by a 2-year warranty. Any technical problem you experience with the product during this period will be repaired free of charge under warranty.
ReturnPolicy.warrantyText2: The warranty period starts from the invoice date, and any malfunction that may occur during this period will be fixed free of charge by Bursa Somine.
